node.name: threepio
node.shortdescription:
Now supports StarDict ... Threepio it is not only multilingual dictionary - it is a enhanced database tool for any data might be introduced as pair key-value or source=destination. But it descend from dictionary so it is main purpose.
...In 2.2 version wos added support for stardict format - the most popular and famous format of dictionaries...
You may also to download and plug in xdxf dictionaries from http://xdxf.revdanica.com/down/
You may to edit dictionaries(storages) or it articles(items), you may to create a new storages and
new items and obtain very fast search by key. By default for store each of storage used
H2 database in the own folder and search will occur independently in own thread for each database. Thanks to datascooter you may to use almost any other RDBMS - Oracle, DB2, MSSQl, MySql, PostgreSql, Derby - all tables will be created automatically. May be integrated into Eclipse IDE - just download plugins ...
node.body:
Now supports StarDict ... Threepio it is not only multilingual dictionary - it is a enhanced database tool for any data might be introduced as pair key-value or source=destination. But it descend from dictionary so it is main purpose.
...In 2.2 version wos added support for stardict format - the most popular and famous format of dictionaries...
You may also to download and plug in xdxf dictionaries from http://xdxf.revdanica.com/down/
You may to edit dictionaries(storages) or it articles(items), you may to create a new storages and
new items and obtain very fast search by key. By default for store each of storage used
H2 database in the own folder and search will occur independently in own thread for each database. Thanks to datascooter you may to use almost any other RDBMS - Oracle, DB2, MSSQl, MySql, PostgreSql, Derby - all tables will be created automatically. May be integrated into Eclipse IDE - just download plugins ...
